title: Border, 1795–1835
description:
Wide top band containing dense mixture of exotic flowers and roses. Beneath this is a narrow band resembling egg and dart, but appears to be a floral motif. Printed in orange, green, pink white shades of gray and yellow on deep brown ground.

H# 609

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, 1795–1835.
1795–1835. Block-printed. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1972-42-63.
